properties.description: Quote Character is set to default(No quote character)

SQL.defaultValue: SELECT column_name,         CASE           WHEN data_type = 'NUMBER' AND data_scale = 0 THEN 'double'           WHEN data_type = 'NUMBER' AND data_scale > 0 THEN 'double'           WHEN data_type = 'DATE' THEN 'timestamp'           ELSE 'string'         END                              AS fieldtype,         CASE           WHEN data_type = 'DATE' THEN 'DATETIME2'           ELSE data_type         END                              AS data_type,         Nvl(data_precision, data_length) PRECISION,         data_scale                       scale,         table_name                       table_name,         owner                            table_schema  FROM   all_tab_cols  WHERE  table_name = '<<TABLE>>'         AND owner = '<<OWNER>>'         AND hidden_column = 'NO'

SQL-Original.defaultValue: SELECT * FROM all_tab_cols WHERE table_name = '<<TABLE>>' 	AND owner = '<<OWNER>>'

SQL.defaultValue: SELECT column_name,     CASE 		WHEN data_type = 'bit' THEN 'boolean' 		WHEN data_type = 'bigint' THEN 'long' 		WHEN data_type IN ( 'int', 'smallint' ) THEN 'integer' 		WHEN data_type IN ( 'float', 'double', 'money', 'smallmoney' ) THEN 'double' 		WHEN data_type IN ( 'numeric' ) THEN 'decimal'  		WHEN data_type IN ( 'nvarchar', 'varchar', 'char', 'nchar' ) THEN 'string' 		WHEN data_type IN ( 'date', 'datetime', 'datetime2', 'smalldatetime') THEN 'timestamp' 		ELSE 'string'          	END AS fieldtype,     data_type,     COALESCE(datetime_precision, numeric_precision, character_maximum_length) precision,     numeric_scale scale, 	table_name, 	table_schema FROM information_schema.columns   WHERE table_name = '<<TABLE>>'          AND table_schema = '<<SCHEMA>>'  ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION

SQL-Original.defaultValue: SELECT * FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = '<<TABLE>>' AND table_schema = '<<SCHEMA>>'
